attributes.action: stop brutal Burmese regime from jailing democratic leader Aung San Suu Kyi
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yet again the brutal regime has shown the world community that they are prepared to unlawfully suppress all dissent to sustain their power, by hook or by crook.
We condemn regime's current action on Aung San Suu Kyi and call for immediate action towards the military regime to release Aung Sann Suu Kyi and all political prisoners uncondionally.
We therefore request the Prime Minister Mr Gordon Brown to make every effort to stop the regime from unlawfully jailing Daw Aung San Suu Kyi.
